name: Geolenz
overview:
Geolenz provides an easy to use, smart platform for developing very robust, contextual geocoding applications for large brands and the independent developer community.

Location Aware Technologies

The “location aware” technology world is emerging with a new breed of unique and useful applications and new ideas made possible by geotagging. Right now, however, there is still a rather wide gap between the promise of quality location based services (LBS) and the practical, productive use of location aware applications. Geolenz’s Smart Geocoding helps our customers and partners with rapid time to market deployment.

Geolenz was conceived to bridge this gap. Not a year from now or five years from now, but today. Our patent pending technology is the first-of-its-kind resource for enabling developers and businesses to rapidly deliver precise contextual data for geospatial locations associated with their applications. It doesn’t matter whether the client applications are using photos, tweets, texts or other media assets with coordinates, it’s all good. Our service consumes those coordinates and then rapidly enhances them with rich, contextual information derived from our unique recognition of geospatial relationships in given environments.
